platform.title: About EcoFinds
platform.content: EcoFinds is India's premier sustainable second-hand marketplace, connecting conscious consumers with quality pre-loved items. We're building a circular economy one transaction at a time.

platform.title: Our Features
platform.content: Smart search, verified sellers, secure payments, quality ratings, eco-impact tracking, and community-driven marketplace features make EcoFinds the best choice for sustainable shopping.

platform.title: Environmental Impact
platform.content: Since launch, EcoFinds users have saved over 10 tons of items from landfills and prevented 50 tons of CO2 emissions. Together, we're making a real difference!

platform.title: Community Guidelines
platform.content: We promote respectful trading, honest descriptions, fair pricing, and eco-conscious decisions. Our community values sustainability and trust.

platform.title: Categories Available
platform.content: Browse Electronics, Fashion, Furniture, Books, Sports, Home & Garden, Art & Collectibles, and more. New categories added based on community demand!
